<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Devil's Advocate](/Feats.aspx?ID=940) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Access**
Chelaxian nationality

</column>

---

You know more about the habits of devils than is entirely safe. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks against [devils](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=30) and saving throws against their abilities. In addition, whenever you meet a devil in a social situation, you can immediately attempt a [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) check to Make an Impression on that creature rather than needing to converse for 1 minute. You take a –5 penalty to the check. If you fail, you can engage in 1 minute of conversation and attempt a new check at the end of that time rather than accepting the failure or critical failure result.

**Special** If you have the [Glad-Hand](/Feats.aspx?ID=787) skill feat, you don’t take the penalty to your immediate Diplomacy check if the target is a devil.
name: Devil's Advocate
